body:
That Cloud it's pretty much me when I play the game, always including Yuffie over the other girls I always found her more attractive than Aerith and Tifa, fit athletic young girls with energetic personalities  are my thing.
Sure she's good at sex you could do lot of stuff with her petite slim teen body and naive innocent knowledge, then I imagine Tifa would be a boring girl that only does the missionary position and Aerith it's an asexual.
